verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Saul,<WH7586> when David<WH1732> had returned<WH7725> from the slaughter<WH5221> of the Amalekites,<WH6002> that David<WH1732> remained<WH3427> two<WH8147> days<WH3117> in Ziklag.<WH6860>

and he told<WH559> [them] to teach<WH3925> the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> [the song of] the bow;<WH7198> behold,<WH2009> it is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of Jashar.<WH3477>
"Your beauty,<WH9469> O Israel,<WH3478> is slain<WH2491> on your high<WH1116> places!<WH1116> How<WH349> have the mighty<WH1368> fallen!<WH5307>

"How<WH349> have the mighty<WH1368> fallen<WH5307> in the midst<WH8432> of the battle!<WH4421> Jonathan<WH3083> is slain<WH2491> on your high<WH1116> places.<WH1116>

"How<WH349> have the mighty<WH1368> fallen,<WH5307> And the weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421> perished!"
